plot: The premiere for the play 'The Last Breath' is reaching an end when its main character suddenly becomes conscious of his inevitable death when the curtain falls. He proceeds to hijack the play and it's up to the director to stop him.
title: Bélanger contre le Rideau
plot_es: The premiere for the play 'The Last Breath' is reaching an end when its main character suddenly becomes conscious of his inevitable death when the curtain falls. He proceeds to hijack the play and it's up to the director to stop him.
plot_en: The premiere for the play 'The Last Breath' is reaching an end when its main character suddenly becomes conscious of his inevitable death when the curtain falls. He proceeds to hijack the play and it's up to the director to stop him.
